project_preview_description.text: A project that helps schedule mock interviews at LHL

project_description.text: After graduating from Lighthouse Labs, the school developed a new curriculum for teaching React using React hooks with a TDD approach. This project was based on this new curriculum, completed without any mentor assistance.
Interview Scheduler is a SPA that allows users to book mock interviews at Lighthouse Labs with interviewers available for the day.
Stacks: Storybook, React with hooks, Axios, WebSockets, Jest, testing-library, Cypress. Deployed with CircleCI and Netlify.
